identity.name: Cheatcore
identity.description: A high-performance, ultra-sleek marketplace for digital gaming products.
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix gaming grit with SaaS precision.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel powerful and 'illegal' (in a cool way).
Content is King: Product cards are the heroes.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make neon pop.
Contrast: High contrast is mandatory for the cyberpunk look.

scale.caption: text-xs md:text-sm font-mono text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-widest

buttons.primary: bg-[#00D4FF] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-[#00D4FF]/80 hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(0,212,255,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#39FF14] text-[#39FF14] font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-[#39FF14]/10 transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/10 hover:border-[#00D4FF]/50 transition-all duration-300
cards.feature: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 p-8 hover:bg-white/5 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-[#00D4FF] text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00D4FF] transition-all duration-200

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure neon text has sufficient contrast against black backgrounds. Use drop shadows if necessary.
accessibility.aria_labels: All icon buttons must have aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Space Grotesk' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the Status Page.
Use the glassmorphism classes defined in visual_enhancers for the sticky navbar.
Ensure the primary background is always #050505, not generic black.
Use the 'Electric Blue' (#00D4FF) for primary actions and 'Acid Green' (#39FF14) for success states/secondary accents.
Implement custom cursors or hover effects that feel 'cybernetic'.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective game categories.
For the 'Hero Section', implement a 3D tilt effect on the main visual card.
Do NOT use gradients for the main background; keep it solid #050505 with subtle grid overlays.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
